title: 404 error/Label API
fixSteps: Open the order and check if a label has been printed, but the order still shows as â€˜Packedâ€™.
If yes, create asana card for the FC to cancel the labels and reship the orders. E.g.: https://app.asana.com/0/1200737019007719/1206934937449352/f
If no then retry to print the label it should work as there might be a timeout error

title: Carrier response doesn't contain a label.
patterns: Carrier response doesn't contain a label.
fixSteps: Check if the letters in the address are in the English alphabet; if they are not, ask Chat GPT to translate them for you and enter that into the address instead. You have to delete everything that is not in the English alphabet and then resolve the issue,

title: City "Ensure this field has no more than X characters.â€
patterns: City "Ensure this field has no more than X characters.â€
fixSteps: Count the X first characters in the city field in the address and delete the rest
Only if 30 characters:
Then open the shipping method in AA and click on edit: https://app.hive.app/admin/shipping_methods and click on the check box:

title: Company_name: "Ensure this field has no more than 50 characters.â€
patterns: Company_name: "Ensure this field has no more than 50 characters.â€

title: ["consignee: Please enter a house number.", "consignee: The address could not be encoded to a routing code."]
patterns: ["consignee: Please enter a house number.", "consignee: The address could not be encoded to a routing code."]
fixSteps: 1. Check if there is a space in the house number field or extra characters like â€œ. , /â€
2. Check if there is any extra characters like â€œ. , / â€œ in the street field
3. Delete it
4. Save the changes in the address
5. Try to print the shipping label again

title: endcloud error occurred: Please use the normal_printer endpoint when printing A4 labels
patterns: endcloud error occurred: Please use the normal_printer endpoint when printing A4 labels

title: Error message: consignee: Please enter a house number. consignee: The adress could not be encoded to a routing code.
patterns: Error message: consignee: Please enter a house number. consignee: The adress could not be encoded to a routing code.
fixSteps: Check if in the street name or house number has â€˜ - â€™ , â€˜ / â€™ sign
If yes â†’ then delete these signs and put a space instead. And save the address and resolve the delivery restriction.
If not â†’ then check the address and raise address validation issue if the address is not correct .

title: Error Message:["consignments[0]: Consignment measurements (dimensions, grossWeight, articleValue) exceed limitations of available shipment types"]
patterns: Error Message:["consignments[0]: Consignment measurements (dimensions, grossWeight, articleValue) exceed limitations of available shipment types"]
fixSteps: If we get this error message and in address line to we have â€œCase Postale 262â€ and the carrier is
DPD CH MeinEinkauf DDP then we can change the shipping method to-Swiss Post CH MeinEinkauf DDP

As mentioned in https://linear.app/hive-logistics/issue/DFB2B-3506/tech-support-cannot-create-shipping-label linear ticket and the relevant slack https://hive-logistics.slack.com/archives/C039C1DQB1R/p1747906847431999

title: {"errors":{"id":"expected String to be a id"}} - Glucose Goddess
patterns: {"errors":{"id":"expected String to be a id"}} - Glucose Goddess
fixSteps: Shipment to Italy, Check on Google Map the location and select carrier as follows:
For Mainland: GLS Italy Hive / GLS IT National Express Mainland
For Saridinia: GLS Italy Hive / GLS IT National Express Saridinia
For Sicily Calabria: GLS Italy Hive / GLS IT National Express Sicily Calabria

title: Sendcloud error occurred: house_number: "Ensure that house number has at most 8 characters (it has 9)."
fixSteps: Check the house number length in the address.
Shorten the house number or move extra info to address line 2.
Recreate the label and retry shipment creation.

title: For all other merchants except Glucose Goddess with the error message: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The order value is not in Euros; convert it to Euros for Delivengo, as only Euros are accepted."
patterns: For all other merchants except Glucose Goddess with the error message: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The order value is not in Euros; convert it to Euros for Delivengo, as only Euros are accepted."
fixSteps: Reach out to the merchant and give them the following two options:
â€¢ Cancel the shipment and create a duplicate with the order value in EUR, so we can process it with Delivengo.
â€¢ Switch the carrier to Colissimo FR Domicile DAP International, which accepts GBP values.

title: For all other merchants except Glucose Goddess with the error message: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: The order value is not in Euros; convert it to Euros for Delivengo, as only Euros are accepted."

fixSteps: Reach out to the merchant and give them the following two options:
â€¢ Cancel the shipment and create a duplicate with the order value in EUR, so we can process it with Delivengo.
â€¢ Switch the carrier to Colissimo FR Domicile DAP International, which accepts GBP values.

title: GLS non_field_errors: "Service error: The receiver address cannot be validated by carrier. Please check city and state."
patterns: GLS non_field_errors: "Service error: The receiver address cannot be validated by carrier. Please check city and state."
fixSteps: This is because the City field is not recognized as a city. To fix this take the State/Province code and chop it in the city field, and take what was previously in the city field and put it in address line 2
Make sure to write the full state name in city field

title: GLS Specific â€œThe order number already existsâ€ / â€˜â€™The provided order number already existsâ€™â€™/ Service error: This order number is already usedâ€”please enter a unique order number to proceed.
patterns: GLS Specific â€œThe order number already existsâ€ / â€˜â€™The provided order number already existsâ€™â€™/ Service error: This order number is already usedâ€”please enter a unique order number to proceed.
fixSteps: We can only ship one shipment per day with the same order ID across all of our GLS Spain shipments.
Wait for one day to resolve the issue.
https://hive-logistics.slack.com/archives/C01C81H9KST/p1713187506510009?thread_ts=1713181020.382169&cid=C01C81H9KST for reference

title: Parcel label number running out

Reach out to AM, we probably need new parcel label numbers because the carrier ran out.

title: Postal code is invalid/missing
fixSteps: United Arab Emirates and Hong Kong do not have postal codes. Therefore:
â€¢ if we receive an error saying that itâ€™s missing, add 00000 to the postal code
â€¢ if we receive an error saying that postal code is not needed, remove it

title: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: Your label could not be announced at this moment, most likely because of an outage. For more information please see: status.sendcloud.com"
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: non_field_errors: "Service error: Your label could not be announced at this moment, most likely because of an outage. For more information please see: status.sendcloud.com"
fixSteps: If this appears it means there is some issue from sendcloud side. Mostly its a service error between sendcloud and carrier side. It gets solved after sometime or we can see the status in http://status.sendcloud.com or contact sendcloud support chat

title: Sendcloud error occurred: order_number: "String should have at most 15 characters: order_numberâ€
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: order_number: "String should have at most 15 characters: order_numberâ€
fixSteps: Raise a linear ticket to ask the tech team to reduce the shop order ID to under 15 characters. After they do this we will be able to print the labels.

patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: parcel_items: "{}, {'sku': ['This field may not be null.']}, {}"x
fixSteps: Check if the SKUs in the order all have SKU IDs.
If not, create SKU customs information missing issue.

title: Sendcloud error occurred: postal_code: "Enter a valid zip code."

fixSteps: Check the postal code on G Maps (exceptions: RoyalMail finder â†’ UK orders | GLS Portal for IT orders shipped via GLS)

title: Sendcloud error occurred: reference: "Ensure the reference field contains no more than 20 characters.â€
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: reference: "Ensure the reference field contains no more than 20 characters.â€
fixSteps: This issue happens because the shop order ID exeeds 20 characters here is how to deal with it:
1- open sendcloud to the right fc
2- use the search funciton to search the shop order id to find the label
3- click on edit and instead of x characters for the shop order id, shorten it to 20
4- save adn print the label and manually upload it in the fc app( use the same shippping method )
5- to find the tracking number, maek sure to search the new 20 character shop order id in sendcloud!!!

title: Sendcloud error occurred: reference: "Ensure the reference field contains no more than 20 characters.â€
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: reference: "Ensure the reference field contains no more than 20 characters.â€

1- open sendcloud to the right fc
2- use the search funciton to search the shop order id to find the label
3- click on edit and instead of x characters for the shop order id, shorten it to 20
4- save adn print the label and manually upload it in the fc app( use the same shippping method )
5- to find the tracking number, maek sure to search the new 20 character shop order id in sendcloud!!!

title: Sendcloud error occurred: This shipment does not match the sendcloud shipping method restrictions - COD orders
patterns: Sendcloud error occurred: This shipment does not match the sendcloud shipping method restrictions - COD orders
fixSteps: - Is the order more than one shipment and all are COD ?
- Does it say shipped for one of them?
if yes> wait, as the first shipment have to be delivered (confirm with the link or sendcloud)before the second shipment can be shipped
then the second shipment will be shipped with a non COD service
â†’if the first one was returned : contact the merchant and tell them to cancel adn create a new order

if yes> wait, as the first shipment have to be delivered (confirm with the link or sendcloud)before the second shipment can be shipped
then the second shipment will be shipped with a non COD service

Recreate the label and retry shipment creation.

title: "Service error: The package exceeds the maximum allowable length; please reduce its size to comply with carrier requirements."
patterns: "Service error: The package exceeds the maximum allowable length; please reduce its size to comply with carrier requirements."
fixSteps: Usually an error due to the shop order id being too long, for these we search the order on SC, check if there are any labels in incoming orders with issues or announcement failed errors, remove spaces or extra chars (so that it is <=20 chars) from the shop order id on SC and try printing the label again.

fixSteps: Shipment method DHL DE Economy Paket DAP International
Maximum weight limit of each shipment is 20 Kgs.

title: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot ship the order because there are no upcoming pickup slots available.Please adjust the pickup slot and retry. (Code: S-503)
patterns: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot ship the order because there are no upcoming pickup slots available.Please adjust the pickup slot and retry. (Code: S-503)
fixSteps: Check address fields - probably an address issue.

title: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot ship the order because there are currently no shipping services available for the recipient address. Please validate the recipient address and try again. If address is accurate, please ship these orders with a different shipping provider. (Code: A-300)
patterns: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot ship the order because there are currently no shipping services available for the recipient address. Please validate the recipient address and try again. If address is accurate, please ship these orders with a different shipping provider. (Code: A-300)
fixSteps: Verify the address on G-Maps, make sure the street, city and zip code match. Check https://weblabeling.gls-italy.com/ if the gls service is down for that area

title: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot ship the order because there are no upcoming pickup slots available.Please adjust the pickup slot and retry. (Code: S-503)

title: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot ship the order due to an internal service error. Please contact us for additional support. (S-900)
patterns: We apologize for the inconvenience. We cannot ship the order due to an internal service error. Please contact us for additional support. (S-900)
